All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CommandForceMOTD
The /forcemotd command.
CommandReloadMOTD
The /reloadmotd command.
ConfigLoader
Responsible for loading and parsing the YAML config file.
ConfigLoader.ParsedConfig
Represents a parsed configuration.
MagicMOTD
The main class for the MagicMOTD plugin.
PingHandler
Listens for the ProxyPingEvent and handles it.
Rewrites the MOTD.
PlayerDB
A KV store of player IP addresses to names.
PostLoginHandler
Listens for the PostLoginEvent and handles it.
Stores the player's name under their IP in the database.
